text: Grace Martine Tandon (better known as Daya; born October 24, 1998) is an American singer-songwriter. She released her self titled extended play (EP), Daya, on September 4, 2015. The EP included the song "Hide Away". "Hide Away" peaked at #23 on Billboard Hot 100. On October 7, 2016, she released her first studio album Sit Still, Look Pretty. In 2017, Daya was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Dance Recording for her work on the song "Don't Let Me Down" from the Chainsmokers. Daya was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American R&B; singers Category:American pop musicians Category:Musicians from Pittsburgh Category:Singers from Pittsburgh Category:1998 births Category:Living people
title: Daya (singer)
